name: entri
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mp2an(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c0, cen, c2), wbr(c2, cen, c1))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cen, c1)
-| wbr(c0, cen, c2)
-| wbr(c2, cen, c1)
-| wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c2), wbr(c2, cen, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cen, c1)
-| wbr(c0, cen, c2)
-| wbr(c2, cen, c1)
-| wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c2), wbr(c2, cen, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c2), wbr(c2, cen, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cen, c1)
-| wbr(c0, cen, c2)
-| wbr(c2, cen, c1)

comment: A chained equinumerosity inference. (Contributed by NM, 25-Sep-2004.)
